text:
I encountered the following error.

$ ant -v
Error: JAVA_HOME is not defined correctly.
  We cannot execute /usr/j2sdk1_3_1_01/bin/java -Xmx128m -Djavax.net.ssl.trustSt
ore=/usr/j2sdkee1.3/lib/security/cacerts.jks -Djava.security.auth.policy=/usr/j2
sdkee1.3/lib/security/jaas.policy
$

fyi, I could not find the file jaas.policy anywhere on my server.
Any help is appreciated.
creator: fchew88@yahoo.com.sg

text:
The "JAVA_HOME" not defined correctly would be your bug, not Ant's.

Ant is telling you that your environment variable are wrong.

Check the settings of "JAVA_HOME" and "JAVACMD" in your environment.
creator: tim@adjective.org
